HomePage.title: School Friends
HomePage.subtitle: Choose your character and start the adventure!

byte.name: Byte
byte.subject: Computer Science
byte.description: Byte will teach you computer science

lumi.name: Lumi
lumi.subject: Romanian Language

Common.pressToSeeResults: Press "Check answers" to see your final result!
Common.checkAgain: Check the number of balls again.

intro.greeting: Hi, I'm Maya! Let's play with numbers!
intro.ready: Are you ready for the challenge?

level1.title: Level 1
level1.subtitle: Comparison Operations
level1.description: Let's learn to compare numbers using signs: > (greater than), < (less than) and = (equal)!

level2.title: Level 2
level2.subtitle: Addition and subtraction exercises
level2.description: Let's learn to solve addition and subtraction exercises! We will fill in missing values in math equations and learn to work with number schemes.

level3.title: Level 3
level3.subtitle: Tens and ones
level3.description: Let's learn to count tens and ones! Balls on one side represent tens (T), and balls on the other side represent ones (O). For example: 2 balls + 5 balls = 25!
level3.putBalls: Put the balls on the table! Left = Tens (T), Right = Ones (O)
level3.dragHere: Drag balls here or click to remove

level4.title: Level 4
level4.subtitle: Addition and Subtraction
level4.description: Let's learn addition and subtraction! You will complete addition tables, subtraction tables and solve animal problems.
level4.exercise1Desc: Fill in the empty boxes in the addition tables!
level4.exercise2Desc: Fill in the empty boxes in the subtraction tables!
level4.exercise3Desc: Solve animal problems! Were + Arrived = Total
level4.exercise4Desc: Were - Left = Remained. Find the missing values!

level5.title: Level 5
level5.subtitle: Fruits and Money
level5.description: Learn to balance weights, calculate prices and give change! Each fruit has a different weight and price.
level5.whatYouLearnBalance: Balance the scale! Each fruit has a different weight. Add fruits to the right side to balance the scale.
level5.whatYouLearnPrice: Calculate the total price of the fruits in the box! Each fruit has a different price.
level5.whatIsPrice: How much do all the fruits cost?
level5.chooseFruitsForRight: Choose fruits for the right side:
level5.balanceFail: The scale is not balanced! Try again.
level5.moneySuccess: Perfect! You chose the right banknotes! üí∞
level5.moneyFail: Not enough money! Add more banknotes.
level5.changeFail: The change is incorrect! Check again.

finalBossGame.rule1: A number appears in the orange box
finalBossGame.rule2: Find the expression that gives this result
finalBossGame.rule5: First to answer correctly wins the point
finalBossGame.winMessage: Maya defeated Sting! You are the math champion! üåü
finalBossGame.tieMessage: A close fight! Try again for victory!
finalBossGame.loseMessage: Don't worry! Practice and try again! üí™

Info.title: Computer Science with Byte

intro.greeting: Hi, I'm Byte! Let's explore the world of computers!
intro.ready: Are you ready for the adventure?

Info.answeredCorrectly: You answered correctly {score} out of {total} questions!

level5Game.title: ‚å®Ô∏è First Steps in Programming
level5Game.subtitle: Create command sequences!
level5Game.clickBlocksToCreate: Click on blocks to create program...
level5Game.c1desc: Program the bunny to go 3 steps forward
level5Game.c2desc: Program the bunny to collect 2 carrots
level5Game.c3desc: Program the bunny to pass over rock
level5Game.c3goal: Go, jump over rock, then go! ü™®
level5Game.c4desc: Use a loop to repeat actions

level4Game.title: üõ°Ô∏è Internet Safety
level4Game.subtitle: Choose the safest option!
level4Game.safeChoices: You made {score} safe choices out of {total}!
level4Game.tip2: üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß Tell parents if something bothers you
level4Game.tip5: ‚ö†Ô∏è Be careful with links and downloads
level4Game.s1q: A stranger on the internet asks for your home address. What do you do?
level4Game.s1a1: I don't give it and tell parents
level4Game.s1a1exp: Correct! Never give personal information to strangers.
level4Game.s1a2exp: Dangerous! We never share our address with strangers on internet.
level4Game.s1a3: I give address but not house number
level4Game.s1a3exp: Still dangerous! No information about home should be shared.
level4Game.s2q: You receive an email with a link from unknown sender. What do you do?
level4Game.s2a1exp: Correct! Unknown links can be dangerous.
level4Game.s2a2: Open link to see what it is
level4Game.s2a2exp: Dangerous! Links can contain viruses or bad sites.
level4Game.s2a3exp: Very good! Always consult a trusted adult.
level4Game.s3q: Someone online offers gifts if you give password. What do you do?
level4Game.s3a1: Don't give password and block person
level4Game.s3a1exp: Excellent! Password is secret and never shared.
level4Game.s3a2exp: Very dangerous! Nobody should know your password.
level4Game.s3a3: Change password and then give it
level4Game.s3a3exp: Still wrong! No password should be shared.
level4Game.s4q: You find an ugly photo on internet. What do you do?
level4Game.s4a1exp: Perfect! Trusted adults can help you.
level4Game.s4a2exp: Not a good idea. Tell parents instead.
level4Game.s4a3exp: Wrong! Close page and tell an adult.
level4Game.s5q: Someone online wants to meet you in park. What do you do?
level4Game.s5a1: Don't accept and tell parents immediately
level4Game.s5a1exp: Correct! Never meet strangers from internet.
level4Game.s5a2exp: Very dangerous! Never go to meetings with strangers.
level4Game.s5a3: First ask how old they are
level4Game.s5a3exp: Doesn't matter! Don't meet anyone from internet without parents.
level4Game.s6q: You want to download a free game from unknown site. What do you do?
level4Game.s6a1exp: Very good! Adults can check if it's safe.
level4Game.s6a2exp: Dangerous! May contain viruses or bad programs.
level4Game.s6a3exp: Excellent! Official stores are much safer.

level3Game.title: Simple Algorithms
level3Game.subtitle: An algorithm is a series of steps in the correct order!
level3Game.arrangeSteps: Arrange the steps in the correct order:
level3Game.clickToArrange: Click on steps to arrange them

level2Game.title: Computer Parts
level2Game.subtitle: Match each part with its description!
level2Game.part3desc: We move the cursor on screen

questions.q1a1: An electronic machine that processes information
questions.q2: How do we enter text into a computer?
questions.q3: What do we see on the computer screen?
questions.q4: How do we click on buttons on the screen?
questions.q5: Where do we save files on the computer?
questions.q6: What type of file is a photo?

boss.title: Final Boss: The Robot
boss.subtitle: The ultimate computer science challenge!
boss.rule4: Whoever has the most correct answers wins
boss.congratsMessage: Congratulations! You defeated the Robot and completed all Computer Science levels!
boss.q4: What do you do if you get email from strangers?
boss.q7: Who do you give your password to?
boss.q8: What command makes the bunny move?
boss.q10: What's the first step in brushing teeth?

Results.veryGood: Very good! You did an excellent job!
Results.good: Good! Try again for a perfect result!
Results.tryHarder: Don't give up! Try again, I know you can do better!

level1.title: Level 1
level1.subtitle: The "R" Sound
level1.task: Check the "r" sound in the words that name the objects in the images below.

level2.title: Level 2
level2.subtitle: Syllables and Words
level2.task: Choose the correct syllable division for each word!

level3.title: Level 3
level3.subtitle: Antonyms
level3.task: Find the antonym (opposite) for each word!

level4.title: Level 4
level4.subtitle: Singular and Plural
level4.task: Transform words from singular to plural or vice versa!

level5.title: Level 5
level5.subtitle: Complete the Text
level5.task: Choose the right word to complete the sentence!

boss.title: Final Boss
boss.rule1: Answer questions about Romanian language correctly!
boss.rule2: You have 10 seconds for each question.
boss.rule3: First to get more points wins!
boss.victoryMessage: Congratulations! You defeated the Cunning Fox!

HowToPlay.title: How to Play
HowToPlay.welcome: Welcome to School Friends! This educational game helps you learn different subjects in a fun way.
HowToPlay.step1: Choose your favorite subject from the main page
HowToPlay.step2: Meet your guide character (Maya, Byte or Lumi)
HowToPlay.step4: Earn points and learn new things!
HowToPlay.tip1: Take your time to read each question carefully
HowToPlay.tip2: Don't be afraid to make mistakes - we learn from them!
HowToPlay.tip3: Try to play daily to improve your skills

Contacts.title: Contacts
Contacts.intro: Do you have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

Creators.title: Creators
Creators.intro: School Friends was created with passion for education and technology by a dedicated team.
Creators.creator1Desc: Passionate about technology and education, with experience in developing interactive web applications.
Creators.creator2Desc: A teacher with 10 years of experience, specialized in interactive learning methods for children.
Creators.creator3Desc: Creator of characters and illustrations that make learning more colorful and fun.
Creators.creator4Desc: Specialist in creating engaging educational exercises adapted to children's age.
Creators.missionText: To make education accessible, fun, and effective for all children, turning learning into a pleasant adventure alongside their school friends: Maya, Byte, and Lumi!
